nodes.text: The Forgotten Terrace was a location in the jungles of Yavin 4. During the Revanite crisis, leading members of the Yavin Coalition, such as Darth Marr and Grand Master Satele Shan travelled to the Forgotten Terrace with a ship that departed from the Coalition Command Post. The Coalition's forces confronted Revan at a Revanite temple situated in the Forgotten Terrace and managed to defeat him.
